articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT rahat.eth
Happy to announce that as of today I am now Head of Developer Relations at @biconomy. 
Over the past few months I’ve been thinking about the terrible UX we accept in web3 today. I started doing some front end talks and workshops to talk about common UX patterns in web3 today.

articles.description:
RT gretzke.lens
Today we participated in @matchbox_dao 0xMonaco Battle of Titans! We as part of the @0xPolygon  team took 2nd place against 12 opponents. In the end we lost to @Uniswap by a close margin.
Let's dig into our strategy!
(find our source code at the end)

articles.description:
🚨 Latest stats on the $CODE #Airdrop 👀 🚨 
Still > 50% of recipients haven't claimed their allocation. This is > 40% of the entire airdroped supply.
Getting $CODE into the peoples hands is important for decentralisation.
Please claim before Feb 18th 🫡

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT Ahmad Abugosh
For my web3 friends 🙏
There are just a few days left to support @Givethio in the @Gitcoin Alpha round. 
Through the power of quadratic funding, a small amount from you can be amplified to have a big impact!


Giveth - Gitcoin Alpha Round 🌏: We’ve got great things in store for 2023 & we’re working FAST to bring them to you.
As we’re largely funded by donations, this @gitcoin Alpha Round is a big one for us!
💜 Please consider supporting our grant: 
So what's in the works?
🧵👇
 https://grant-explorer.gitcoin.co/#/round/1/0xd95a1969c41112cee9a2c931e849bcef36a16f4c/0xb746c0f648f9b930ea4568cf8741067a7fc7eb3928ac13cced8076212cf3cf37-0xd95a1969c41112cee9a2c931e849bcef36a16f4c

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT Push DAO
Excited to welcome our newest grantee @woop_pay 🔔✨
Developed as a collective venture by our frens at @developer_dao and @d_d_agency_web3, Woop Pay is on a mission to simply crypto payments and Push will power useful real time notifications for transactions.

Woop Pay: Woop Pay has partnered with @pushprotocol as part of their grant program to bring you more convenience! Users will receive real-time updates on payment requests with Push notifications, making it easier to keep track of your transactions. Get started at
 http://wooppay.xyz
